paragraphs.text:
%md
# Description

This notebook runs the SETUP instructions for DWARE/04-Materialized_Views.

The `Download Data` section generally does not need to be run as the files are already on the system.
You can usually start from the `Reset` section by checking that the .tsv files are in the /tmp/movie directory and continue from there.

msg.data:
Description

This notebook runs the SETUP instructions for DWARE/04-Materialized_Views.

The Download Data section generally does not need to be run as the files are already on the system.
You can usually start from the Reset section by checking that the .tsv files are in the /tmp/movie directory and continue from there.

paragraphs.title: Retrieve the files from IMDB
paragraphs.text:
%sh
rm -r /tmp/movie
mkdir -p /tmp/movie
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.basics.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movie/title.basics.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.crew.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movie/title.crew.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/name.basics.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movie/name.basics.tsv.gz
wget -nv https://datasets.imdbws.com/title.ratings.tsv.gz -O /tmp/movie/title.ratings.tsv.gz

paragraphs.title: Use gunzip to extract the files
Copy the data into HDFS
paragraphs.text:
%sh
sudo -u hdfs kinit -kt /etc/security/keytabs/hdfs.headless.keytab hdfs-cloudair
sudo -u hdfs klist
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -rm -r -skipTrash /data/movie
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -mkdir /data/movie
sudo -u hdfs hdfs dfs -put /tmp/movie/* /data/movie/

paragraphs.title: Create the movie database
Create the movie_title_stage table and load data
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS movie_title_stage;
-- Contains the following information for titles
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE movie_title_stage (
                        tconst string,
                        titleType string,
                        primaryTitle string,
                        originalTitle string,
                        isAdult string,
                        startYear string,
                        endYear string,
                        runtimeMinutes string,
                        genres ARRAY<STRING>
                        ) 
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_title_stage/';

-- Load data
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movie/title.basics.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE movie_title_stage;

-- Remove header for movie_title
ALTER TABLE movie_title_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");

paragraphs.title: Create the movie_crew_stage table and load data
Create the movie_crew_info_stage table and load data
paragraphs.text:
%jdbc(hive_interactive)
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS movie_crew_info_stage;
-- Contains the information for names
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE movie_crew_info_stage(
                        nconst string,
                        primaryName string,
                        birthYear string,
                        deathYear string,
                        primaryProfession ARRAY<STRING>,
                        knownForTitles ARRAY<STRING>
                        )
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED 
FIELDS TERMINATED BY '\t' 
LOCATION '/warehouse/tablespace/external/hive/movie_crew_info_stage/';

-- Load data movie_crew_info
LOAD DATA  INPATH '/data/movie/name.basics.tsv' OVERWRITE INTO TABLE movie_crew_info_stage;

-- Remove header for movie_crew_info
ALTER TABLE movie_crew_info_stage SET TBLPROPERTIES ("skip.header.line.count"="1");

paragraphs.title: Create the rating_stage table and load data
Confirm the tables have been created and loaded correctly
